functions: Lock validated traps into AZORI memory
Sync prop outcomes across simulation mesh
Log lifecycle events and final prop alignment
Transfer EV-tiered props to memory archive
Flag props for long-term trend tracking

escalation_rules: Tier 1 props tagged for extended retention

description: Final memory and signal sync node for AZORI. Locks EV-aligned traps, archives overlay routing, and logs prop lifecycle status across nodes.
